purpose: To provide a simple yet effective framework for building AI agents with minimal dependencies.
principle: Built on Python, it leverages a lightweight architecture focusing on essential tools to ensure ease of use and quick deployment.
reusability: Designed for plug-and-play with seven core tools, offering a straightforward API for integration and customization.
limitations: Limited to predefined tools, may not support complex use cases requiring extensive customization or additional tools.
name: toolkami
description: Minimal AI agent framework that just works with only seven tools.
highlight: Minimalistic AI agent framework with only seven essential tools for streamlined functionality.
